dmca.title: Tolkien Enterprises Lords Its Licenses over Online Gamers
dmca.body:
HOWARD
RICE
NEMEROVSKI
CANADY
FALK
& RABKIN October 4,2005
Three Embarcadero Center
Seventh Floor
San Francisco, CA 941 1 1-4024
Telephone 415 434 1600
Facsimile 415 217 5910

[Private]
[Private]
VIA EMAIL
TO: webmaster@merp.com and hostmaster@rightsfiglit.com
MEW. com
Re: Iron Crown Enterprises Materials

Dear Sir or Madam:
We represent The [Private] Company d.b.a. Tolkien Enterprises (SZC) with
respect to intellectual property matters. SZC owns the exclusive worldwide right to create,
produce, license, publish, sell, and offer for sale derivative works including without limitation
role-playing games based on J.R.R. Tolkiens literary trilogy known as The Lord ofthe Rings
and his novel, The Hobbit (the Tolkien Works). The copyrights in the Tolkien Works have
been registered in the U.S. Copyright Office.

Our client recently learned that you are operating a website at <www.merp.com>
that infringes SZCs intellectual property rights. Specifically, MERP.com offers for display,
distribution, and download numerous copyrighted materials previously published by Iron Crown
Enterprises in relation to its Middle Earth Role Playing Game system (the ICE Materials).
SZC holds all copyrights to the ICE Materials through assignment.
Our client has not authorized these activities in relation to its copyrighted works.
Therefore, the copying, promotion, display, and distribution of the ICE Materials constitute
infringement of SZCs copyrights. Thus far, SZC has counted over 65 separate examples of ICE
Materials available for unlawful download through the MERP.com website.
SZC is required to take immediate action to protect its valuable intellectual property
rights. 

In order to resolve this matter expeditiously, we ask that, within fourteen (14) days of the date of this letter, MERP.com:

1. cease all distribution and distribution-related activities related to the ICE Materials;

2. collect and destroy all copies of the ICE Materials in MERP.coms possession or control, including copies in both hardcopy and digital form; MERP.com

3. remove all references to, and excerpts from, the ICE Materials on the
MERP.com website <www.merp.com>; and

4. provide us with a written statement in which you certify that MERP.com has
fully complied with the above items and in which MERP.com agrees that it will
not produce, copy, distribute, display, advertise, promote, offer for sale, or sellthe ICE Materials or any other work based on the Tolkien Works in any manner in the future, until such time, if any, as all copyrights in the Tolkien Works have expired.

SZC would like to resolve this matter expeditiously and without the need for any
legal proceedings. To that end, please respond immediately with your agreement to comply with
the above terms.

SZC takes infringements very seriously. This letter is not a complete statement of
SZCs rights. SZC reserves all rights and remedies against MERP.com and any other party in connection with this matter.

Very truly yours,

[Private]
[Private]
